thread.title: JESSICA B
thread.title_full: RI Student Loan Authority/College Planning Center of RI reviewed by JESSICA B

author: JESSICA B
title: JESSICA B
text: RISLA actually cares about you, easy loan application and people who actually pick up the phone.. that's right ffolks! No automated voice machine asking you a thousand questions before you speak to them. Extremely grateful for their care and concern.
